entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING ENDED, Pond Inlet
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 03:53 AM EST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of light snow. High minus 32.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 32. Wind chill near minus 46. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 33 with temperature rising to minus 29 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending early this evening then partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 33 with temperature rising to minus 29 by morning. Wind chill minus 45 this evening and minus 38 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 15 January 2023
